info.brief_description: buizels giant adventure begins when he was growing.
info.description:
it begins when buizel when he either experimently shot by a growth ray gun or unusually grew big by his own right Can he grow more?
He's either slim, athletic, buff, super buff or ultra buff.
If he's fat he might be muscle gut so don't make him lose weight.
No fetishes but foot massaging is okay only Riolu's feet. Buizel is the only one.
Mega macro male shiny pokemon can join too. (I mean only male)
Their weight can change too.
You cannot end the story.
Pokemon with four legs can stay walking on four legs or stand up and walk on two legs.
Pokemon who can stand up and walk on two legs like riolu and lucario will be plantigrade (means walking with the podials and metatarsals flat on the ground)
